Package fi.abo.kogni.soile2.datamanagement.git

package fi.abo.kogni.soile2.datamanagement.git
This package contains all files concerened with handling git elements and git access They handle communication with the gitProviderVerticle that has to be set up for the SOILE Server to work.
Author:
Thomas Pfau
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GitDataRetriever<T>
    This abstract class provides a general implementation of a DataRetriever for gitFiles and a target object.
    GitElement
    This Class represents a key to a given git repository at a given version.
    GitFile
    This represents all data necessary to retrieve the file for a given repository (the repository id can e.g. be a task/project or similar).
    GitManager
    This class manages access to the gitProviderVerticles via the eventbus..
    ObjectManager
    A Manager for Git Objects
